message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $11,500 is fair.  What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $9,800 is quite a ways off from what I'm willing to accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,900? I'm confident you won't find a better deal for this quality.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,900 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,200. Can you meet me there?
